title: Masks Come Off After Mandate Is Dropped, but Confusion Remains
sub_head: Many travelers remove their masks on public transportation for first time in over a year
body:
ORLANDO, Fla.— Many travelers were allowed to remove their masks on public transportation for the first time in over a year Tuesday, while others remained confused with exactly what to do, following the abrupt end to America’s mask mandate on mass transport, including onboard aircraft.
On Monday, a Florida federal judge declared the Biden administration’s Covid-19 mask mandate for public transportation unlawful, throwing out its requirement that travelers in the U.S. wear masks on airplanes, trains, taxis, buses and other forms of mass transit.
